definitions.definition: To furnish or give experimental knowledge of; to make (one) know; to make familiar .
examples: I think you should acquaint him with the realities of the situation.

definitions.definition: To communicate notice to; to inform ; let know .
definitions.label_groups: transitive , archaic , followed by of or that

main_definition: ( transitive , followed by with ) To furnish or give experimental knowledge of; to make (one) know; to make familiar .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , archaic , followed by of or that ) To communicate notice to; to inform ; let know .
( transitive , obsolete ) To familiarize ; to accustom .
